channel.title: Need help please read!
channel.description:
Okay I know there is a whole post on this but no one will help me with it.
When I try an compile my server I get an error
[code]Javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source file> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
What do i do?
The code for the compiler is: @echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
This is the only thing stopping me from making my server the compiler.. -_-

item.title: Need help please read!
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Brandon12111 Mod Brandon12111
item.description:
@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

Here use this compiler.

@echo off
title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d ./Bin ./Files/./Go/./here/*.java
Pause

Read full topic

item.title: Need help please read!
item.dc:creator: @Dhfhy1 Dhfhy1
item.description:
@Dhfhy1 wrote:

Do you have JDK ? if not you need to go to http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp and download JDK, then once you have JDK go into your compiler and change it to your JDK version.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help please read!
item.dc:creator: @scipyo scipyo
item.description:
@scipyo wrote:

Okay I know there is a whole post on this but no one will help me with it.

When I try an compile my server I get an error

Javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source file> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .

pause
